mapper.select: select r.rno, r.grno, r.mile, r.cost, r.liter, DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%m-%d') as group_date, g.c_nick, g.effi from refuel r left outer join garage g on r.grno = g.grno where r.grno = #{no} order by ref_dt desc limit 8

select DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') as group_date, avg(cost) as cost from refuel where ref_dt > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -60 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') group by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') desc limit 3

select grno, DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') as group_date, avg(cost) as cost from refuel where grno = #{no} and ref_dt > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -60 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') group by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%m') desc limit 3

select r.grno, r.rno, g.mno, g.mile, r.cost, r.lcost, g.effi, r.ref_dt, o.fuel from refuel r left outer join garage g on r.grno = g.grno left outer join official o on o.mdno = g.mdno where g.grno = #{no} order by ref_dt desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into refuel(grno, ref_dt, mile, cost, liter, lcost) values(#{myCarNo}, #{refuelDate}, #{mile}, #{cost}, #{liter}, #{literCost})
mapper.select: select grno, DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%c-%e') as group_date from refuel where grno = #{no} order by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%c') asc
select grno, DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%c') as group_date, sum(cost) as cost from refuel where grno = #{no} group by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%c') order by DATE_FORMAT(ref_dt, '%Y-%c') asc
select * from refuel where ref_dt = #{date} and grno = #{selectCar}
mapper.update: update refuel set ref_dt = #{redate}, mile = #{remile}, lcost = #{reliterCost}, cost = #{recost}, liter = #{reliter} where ref_dt = #{date} and grno = #{selectCar}
